objects.text:
• Complete Apple Ecosystem
• MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone
• Seamless Integration
• Premium Aluminum Design

product_details.name: Apple Premium Device Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Set
product_details.description:
• Complete Apple ecosystem: MacBook Pro, iPad, and iPhone in one package
• MacBook Pro featuring Retina Display and backlit keyboard
• Premium aluminum unibody construction across all devices
• Seamless integration between devices with iCloud and Continuity features
• MacBook Pro with Force Touch trackpad and latest macOS
• iPad with high-resolution display, perfect for productivity and entertainment
• iPhone with Touch ID and advanced camera system
• All devices in pristine silver/white finish
• Latest generation devices with powerful processors
• Perfect for professionals, creators, and Apple ecosystem enthusiasts
• Instant setup and synchronization between all devices
• Ideal for work, creativity, and personal use

banner_details:
This promotional banner is visually segmented into four quadrants using soft gray and white backgrounds, enhanced with subtle diagonal dividing lines and translucent circular overlays. The top-left quadrant introduces the product with bold, uppercase text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") conveying the bundle name in a clean sans-serif typeface. Below, a smaller tagline ("tagline") highlights a limited-time offer. The top-right quadrant features a product image ("product_image") of a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone, complemented by decorative blue dots. The lower-left quadrant, set on a vivid blue background, includes detailed feature points ("description"), a bold price label ("price"), and a prominent white call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta"). The overall layout combines clarity with a tech-forward aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- #147EFB (Vivid Blue)
- #333333 (Charcoal Text)
- #FFFFFF (White)
- #E8E8E8 (Light Gray)
- #D6D6D6 (Medium Gray)
- #F5F5F5 (Off White)
product_color: The product image showcases Apple devices — a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone — with a sleek, modern aesthetic featuring a refined color palette. The primary colors include Space Gray (#A2AAAD), Black (#000000), and White (#FFFFFF) for the devices themselves. The MacBook screen presents a scenic wallpaper with smooth pastel blends of Pink (#D9A5B3), Soft Blue (#A6CBE3), and Earthy Brown (#8A6452), creating a calm and premium tone. The iPad introduces Deep Blue (#234060) from its space background, adding contrast. Color blending is subtle and professional, balancing vibrancy and minimalism. These tones can form a cohesive banner design that feels elegant and high-end.
